question: Is it Haraam to work in a store like Checkers which sells Haraam items? (eg being a cashier in which you will sell the item to the customer )
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Since you will not be actively involved in selling the Haraam item, you will
be excused for collecting monies for Haraam items purchased at the store.

And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
